tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is a skilled doctor and can treat kids with care. So far we are completely satisfied with her treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We have a 5 year old daughter with 4 bad teeth and she required immediate RCT. All the dentists in Kolkata said a GA is required to do the root canal successfully as she is not very cooperative. We definitely did not want to go for a GA on a 5 year old child. Dr Pooja Singh was amazing with my daughter and she successfully did 3 RCT's on her. Dr Singh was so gentle and caring with my daughter, that she caused no problems during the RCT process. We don't have words good enough to thank the doctor.  Thank you doctor. We are very grateful to you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I took my son to Apurva Dental Care for dental issues several times. I am very pleased with their service and friendly staff. Dr. Puja Singh is exceptionally good with kids, so much that my son does not fear to visit this clinincs. We visited twice during covid time and found this place well equipped with covid norms and following them, which is also very nice.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** ** * **** **** ****** *** very serious ,honest to her profession , very well behaved with professanalism ,deal with kids very nice , fees is moderate according to her efficiency , location of her chamber is very good at garihat but should be more promininent , with glow sign board

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We observed doctor Pooja Singh very intelligent and able to segregate possible cause of the decay in my son's teeth (who is just 3.5 yrs of age). Her experience and analysis of the problem was very helpful to us...now we are feeling very positive that my kid's teeth will be prevented from further decay *** **** *** ***** *** ***** Thanks to the doctor for her ******* *********, polite nature and expert in handling the kid's fear for treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: childrens dentistry,Child teeth problem,Pulpectomy,Kids Root  Canals,
review:
Excellent child dentist. Made the child so comfortable that he started to chat about his school with Dr. Pooja Singh :) . amazing , isn't it !! 

The pulpectomy treatment of one of the tooth which was giving problems while eating and sleeping is done by madam.  

After pulpectomy treatment was completed, a stainless steel cap was put to protect the tooth while the child grows up. Now no problems !! 

Dr. Pooja is a saviour for mother like me.
 
I went to another doctor in the same clinic of Apurva Dental Care and my son was treated by Dr. Pooja Singh.

Doctor Pooja is a kind hearted *** ************* ***** Totally impressed by the doctor and the clinic.

review: My 4 year old daughter had a noticeable cavity in her molar tooth. I took her to 3 different dentists before finding Dr. Pooja Singh. The doctor carefully explained every detail to help me better understand the childâ€™s needs. She was so patient and so very kind to me and especially to my child. We are going with a conservative, slow approach to my young daughter's dental care. Treatment plan was very well explained, the dentist made sure to answer my questions.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My 4year old son had cavity issue. treatment is going on with Dr Pooja Singh. He is very friendly & get confidence of my son while treating him. My son is very comfortable with her (calls Doctor Aunty) Done 2 root canal. 1more to go. A big thanks to Dr Pooja Singh and Practo app. Thanks.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Pooja Singh is a caring dentist for children. I have taken my 8 year old daughter to her. Doctor was very sweet with my child and took time to become friendly with the child, before starting the dental treatment. 

Many teeth had cavities. Some were filled up and in some root canal for children was done. I am totally impressed by the the doctor expertise in her specialty.  My daughter is lot comfortable in eating after the dental treatment by Dr. Pooja.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I have an 8 year old baby. I wanted a dentist who is experienced, patienceful yet good at children dentistry. Dr. Pooja Singh serves both such purposes without the high fees of doctors, which is exactly what I needed. I swear by Dr. Pooja Singh capabilities.

She did a pulpectomy of managing the caries which was causing pain in the tooth of the child. The treatment was so smooth and nice. The dental treatment solved the pain my baby was going through.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: my mother visited for getting one of her inner teeth fixed. the doctor is extremely patient and understanding. she did an amazing job and was helpful with follow ups as well. alignment dental clinic is a great facility, with good staff, kept extremely clean and has modern dental equipment. we had a very pleasant experience with the doctor and i will definitely recommend her and the clinic to everyone. thank you Dr Pooja!

I think one reason is Dr. Pooja explained to him very patiently about the things she will do in course of dental treatment.

The problem is solved. The doctor also did one filling.
